commit message:
Fixed Share Intent tab refresh state.

Merge pull request #67 from SafeSlingerProject/bugfixes_wip

Fixed Share Intent tab refresh state.
formatting clean up
moved messenger Threads use to AsyncTasks
adding new NUM_USERS extra to manage UX flow
adding developers to about box
continuing cleanup in HomeActivity
refactored remaining setup possible to Application
created DraftData for Compose/Intro tab data

Added support for notification vibration and sound control for back-back
messages.
fixed conflicts
Removal of notifications for Messages thread and chat screen.
update line endings to unix-style, reformat

separated in/out message intents, add sound back

correcting some side effects from fix for issue #33

fixing sounds, blank msgs, keypad issues

- Closed #62, bad number keypad
- Fixed #78, restore notification for 'other' thread in view.
- Fixed #49, blank messages

fixed backup notify, login draft, intents, icons

- Fixed #53, backup check unnecessary before setup complete
- Fixed #41, improve Intent interactions
- Fixed #31, creation of draft before login

fixing several UI issues

- Fixed #40, add hash of contact data in prefs
- Fixed #52, auto-link messages prevent copy/forward
- Fixed #61, share web page not working
- Fixed #16, incoming message on compose tab loses editbox focus
- Fixed #42, inconsistent keypad/editbox focus

Added Search to Contacts list (Pick Recipients --> Intro and Compose
Tab)

conflict resolution on pick recipients

Fixed corner case crashes for Android 4.0 below
updates to recipients list

improved ux of queued messages

- adding 'pendingâ€¦' progress

reset line endings back to unix style

string updates

remove 'invalid recipient' messages auto verify

content' toast)
